This Stratocaster has to be the most versatile guitar I own. The 'voices' the Lone Star is capable of are amazing. You can go from playing metal with the strong humbucker at the bridge to rock, country as well as soothing  mellow jazz & blues tones from the Texas Specials at the middle & neck. A great feature is the ability to split the bridge humbucker to play it as a single coil pickup. Fender really outdid themselves on this model packing high quality pickups into a beautifully built quality guitar. The Ocean Turquoise color is beautiful as is the maple fretboard. The workmanship is amazing.  This truly is a smooth playing guitar with great sounds, and it's a great value as well. In fact, based on the way it looks, feels, & sounds, you would swear this was a $2,500 - $3,000 guitar - It's that good. I honestly don't think I could find a guitar that I could possibly enjoy more at any price. Highly recommended!

Another excellent Plant Waves strap. Very Well-made, comfortable and looks great. Got this one for an Ocean Turquoise Stratocaster (although it would go well with many colors). The leather is extremely soft & flexible and the materials used are very fine quality. These are the most comfortable straps I have found, and there are many styles to suit virtually anybody's taste. Highly Recommended!

I first used an SN-8 while visiting a local  music store & was amazed at it's speed, tuning accuracy and easy to read display. (In fact it put my electronic tuner to shame). The following week I ordered one for myself. Once again this little tuner amazes me. I've used it on my Telecaster, my Strat and my vintage acoustic Epiphone, and it always tunes my guitars quickly, precisely and no matter which headstock I put it in I can always find a position where it is very easy to see & read (which was not the case with my other clip-on tuner). I especially like the thick rubber grips that hold it snuggly to the headstock and the large, clear display. The Snark SN-8 is very easy to use & relatively inexpensive. In fact, you might want to keep one in each of your guitars' cases so one is always close at hand. I couldn't be more pleased with a tuner. Highly recommend.

First of all this review is for the LP Adjustable Snare Cajon Model: LP1426This is a beautifully crafted cajon. It is absolute furniture quality craftmanship & is just an unbelievably well-made cajon that sounds fantastic. Add the (easily) adjustable snare and you have what I consider a perfect cajon.The precussion manger of my local Guitar Center (I ordered it on their website, as this model was not stocked in their store)  couldn't believe that I was able to purchase a cajon of such high quality and workmanship for the price I paid. He stated that he felt LP made very high quality cajons and he was very impressed with this model (LP1426) and its adjustable snare.

This is a great idea that goes wrong with an large oversized button that makes it virtually impossible to attach a guitar strap to it. Once I got my strap attached to the button it appears that the button itself is about to fall off of the rivet. I've been playing the guitar for 46 years  and have used countless straps on my guitars, so I know how to carefully attach a strap. The main problem is that the button is too large, now with a button that looks like it is about to come apart from the rivet, if I use this, I risk dropping my vintage guitar on the floor. This is a risk I'm not willing to take. For the $8.95 price I paid for this, it really isn't worth returning it, too bad the button isn't fastened to the rivet better and too bad the button is so large. As I said, this is a great idea that just falls short of achieving its goal, at least with my strap.

My two 25 year-old Amazons are thriving on this food. It's a very good mix of seeds, nuts, fruit etc. and I haven't seen a moth since I started feeding them this. Also one of my Amazons tends to have issues with other mixes, but has no issues with this. It's more expensive than the traditional Forti-diet but IMO it is worth it. I've learned to stay away from low priced parrot food from the discount stores and mix this with a good fruit pellet blend like ZuPreem. Nice to find a blend like this (Fiesta) that my parrots like and the proof is in their empty food dishes.

The Ultimate  GS100 Guitar Stand is well-made, well padded and works just as it should. I also have a GS200  stand which also is very impressive. I had tried an On Stage GS7465 Guitar Stand which was very disappointing, lacking in quality and protective padding. I immediately returned the On Stage and went with another Ultimate Stand. I was not disappointed. Both the GS100 &  GS200 are made with the excellent attention to detail and work perfectly, protecting your guitarsfrom scratches and drops. I'm sold on the Ultimate stands - They fold nicely for carrying yet don't take up much space at all when opened. In fact I keep mine opened and ready to hold a guitar in my music room. These are nice stands that I highly recommend. I would not trust my guitars to a lesser stand.

The Ultimate Support GS200 Guitar Stand is well-made, well padded and works just as it should. I have a GS100 and was looking for a second stand with a "cradle" type holder for my guitars and ordered an On Stage GS7465 Guitar Stand which was very disappointing, lacking in quality and protective padding. I immediately returned the On Stage and ordered a GS200. I was not disappointed. The GS200 is made with the same attention to detail as the GS100 (and good quality materials) and works perfectly.One thing worth noting for those who own a Stratocaster, one of the cradle arms is located right where your cord will be located should you put your Strat in the stand when plugged in, so keep that in mind if you are ordering one to use with your Strat, in that case you might want to go with the GS100. However for me this is not an issue as I can put my Strat in my GS100 when it's plugged in and use the GS200 for my Telecaster or my acoustic Epiphone. In any case, I'm sold on the Ultimate stands - They fold nicely for carrying yet don't take up much space at all when opened. In fact I keep mine opened and ready to hold a guitar in my music room. In fact I keep the two Ultimate stands right next to each other and they get a lot of use. These are nice stands that I highly recommend. I would not trust my guitars to a lesser stand.

The On Stage GS7465 Guitar Stand is a good idea that falls short in the quality department. I was looking for another nice stable  stand to safely hold my Telecaster & my Strat (I already own an Ultimate GS100 stand - which I like very much). I also like that it could apparently also easily hold my acoustic Epiphone. Unfortunately when I opened the package I was underwhelmed by the build quality, but the worst flaw was that some on the padding was already worn off of the cradle right about where the front edge of both my Tele & Strat would sit on this stand. Not wanting my guitars to suffer 'battle scars' due to a poor quality stand, I returned it immediately. I will order an Ultimate GS200, as I am very pleased with their quality. I was hoping these stands were built as well because I really like the stable legs on them, but I wouldn't take the change of one damaging my guitars.

What more can you say than only the best guitar I have ever owned is the Fender Telecaster. The FSR is a wonderful model combining a modern guitar with classic features such as an ash body and a double saddle bridge that gives it the classic Telecaster Twang is spades!The "Tele" has a distinct and classic sound you've heard in most likely thousands of songs over the past 60 years from country to rock. This classic Telecaster twang is hard to describe but is easily identifiable.I love everything about the Tele, from its looks, to its sound and its amazing build quality.Not only do I admire the looks of this Buttersctoch Blonde Telecaster with its maple fretboard, but the tones this Tele is capable of are amazing as well. The FSR is a very special Telecaster - You won't be disappointed.

he Roadmaster Granite Peak Mountain Peak Mountain Bike is an excellent value. Keep in mind this is a relatively inexpensive bike, so don't expect an ultra-light weight bicycle. Still it is not what I would consider a heavy bike either, in fact it is a well-made bike with 18 speeds and thoughtful touches such as a quick adjustable seat. It has excellent tires to ride on rough dirt trails or commute on a city street. The handlebars have a slight upward bend and are positioned very comfortably. We purchased ours (for my wife) at a local big box store and then took it to our local bike shop to have it adjusted properly. Once adjusted we were pleasantly surprised at how well everything works.The brakes work great & the shifters work easily & are precise. The only thing I would change on the bike would be to replace the very hard seat with a more comfortable memory foam seat. (My personal preference is memory foam as opposed to gel seats, because gel seat have a tendency to leak as they get older). Also my wife added a water bottle holder & water bottle - (The mounting screw are already on the frame).Speaking of the frame, it is painted a very attractive shade of teal with purple accents, and it is a very good looking and functional bike. This 24" bike is perfect for the shorter rider. If you are 5'5" or shorter, this will most likely be a much more comfortable bike for you than a 26" bike. When it comes to a value this one would be hard to beat.

I received a nice assortment just as advertised. 8 heavy, 8 medium & 8 thin, in assorted colors. This is a really good value and I find Fender picks are as good as any. Very pleased with these picks. Always good to have an assortment on hand.

I own a Squire Bullet Strat HH in Blue Sparkle with a white pickboard, other than the colors, it is pretty much the same guitar as this black beauty sold here.This guitar is an AMAZING value. Although described as a 'beginner's guitar' I can tell you that this is a nice guitar for anyone who enjoys playing and the dual-coil humbucker pickups are wonderful on an electric guitar at virtually any price due to fantastic sound and their lack of hum through the amplifier.Yes, this guitar's body is constructed of basswood so it is light in weight, but be careful not to ding it up, as basswood has fine acoustic qualities but is a softer wood so it will dent rather easily if not careful with it.My other electric is an Ash wood bodied Fender Telecaster FSR, which is heavier and sounds terrific as Telecasters do, so when I bought this Strat I wasn't expecting much (other than virtually noiseless humbucker pickups). However, as soon as I started playing the Strat I realized I was wrong - Not only does it sound great, but the overall construction of the guitar is wonderful, the fit, finish and quality rivals guitars easily costing three times what I paid for this beauty. Another pleasant surprise was I found that it stays in tune. I've played my Strat for hours and hours and I have not had to re-tune it. Of course if you like using the 'whammy' (tremolo) bar be prepared to tune it often, as the type of tremolo bridge on these guitars will put the guitar out of tune quickly when used. Fortunately I don't use the tremolo bar, and in regular playing, this guitar stays in tune beautifully.This Squire Bullet may not have the cache of it's more famous and more expensive relatives - the Fender Stratocasters and Telecasters, but it certainly shows its Fender bloodlines and is a very enjoyable guitar to own and most importantly, to play. Highly recommend.

These earrings are absolutely adorable and are a very good value as well. We own a number of Moon & Star earrings and these appear to be very well made & look fantastic. The screwbacks make these earrings excellent for children (especially those who tend to lose earrings or earring backs).As with anything, be sure to shop for price, as I've seen these very earrings listed from different sellers at a wide range of prices.Whether for a woman, child, teen or even adult male, these whimsical earrings would make a very nice gift.

These earrings are absolutely adorable and are a very good value as well. We own a number of Moon & Star earrings although these (in 14K Gold Plate are a lower priced pair) they appear to be very well made & look fantastic. The screwbacks make these earrings excellent for children (especially those who tend to lose earrings or earring backs).As with anything, be sure to shop for price, as I've seen these very earrings listed from different sellers at a wide range of prices.Whether for a woman, child, teen or even adult male, these whimsical earrings would make a very nice gift.

After his Best Selling book "Life", Keith Richards follows it up with a fantastic children's book. "Gus & Me" is a wonderful book and an absolutely touching story about how Keith Richards' grandfather 'Gus' got young Keith interested in the guitar (not to mention the wonderful relationship between a grandfather and grandson). Keith's first children's book is indeed wonderful, as are Theodora's illustrations. This is a great book written by a great man who has a great family. Your family will enjoy the book & CD too. How cool is it to play the CD and have Keith Richards read the book to your children? Very Cool!Thanks Keith & Theodora! Highly recommend!

What a wonderful book and an absolutely touching story about how Keith Richards' grandfather 'Gus' got young Keith interested in the guitar (not to mention the wonderful relationship between a grandfather and grandson). Keith's first children's book is indeed wonderful, as are Theodora's illustrations. This is a great book written by a great man who has a great family. Your family will enjoy the book & CD too. How cool is it to play the CD and have Keith Richards read the book to your children? Very Cool!Thanks Keith & Theodora! Highly recommend!

I purchased a Kaito KA 600, and also Kaito KA450 as a surprise gift for my daughter who is going into the second grade. I chose the KA600 radio for the following reasons: 1) It is equipped with electronic tuning complete with RDS on FM. 2) My entire family, including my daughter, appreciates a radio equipped with the NOAA weather bands 3) My family enjoys all kinds of music & sports and the KA600 has a easy to use digital tuner. 4) We all enjoy shortwave & again the KA600 ha shortwave bands. Quality issues aside (for the moment) KA600 has what appears to be far too many nice features too list here however the flash light, reading light, rechargeable (by hand crank or solar power) batteries are all nice touches. They also can produce 'just okay' sound (from the rather small speaker) and decent (but by no means great) volume without distortion. Unfortunately again quality is hit or miss - some radios appear to be okay, others pretty terrible. I found one disappointing issue with this model that seems consistent, generally poor (as in horrible) AM reception. In our area, with a KA600 weaker AM stations can be a real challenge to pull in (more so during the daytime) but more alarming is that even 50,000 Watt stations like WBZ Boston tend to suffer with static and interference most likely due to a rather small internal AM antenna, however if you take the time to reposition the radio you can usually find a position to listen to the major AM stations albeit with static (unfortunately with the KA600 you may appear to be partaking in a game of "Twister" just to get the latest sports scores) however the AM reception does seem to improve somewhat at night. Unfortunately, depending on whether you get a fairly decent one or a bad one this reception issue isn't just limited to AM. I've got one with almost decent FM reception and another that is absolutely dreadful (not to mention the ones we returned due to poor reception). Shortwave reception is poor as well. I wish I could give this radio a solid 5 Star rating however due to the quality issues IMO it doesn't even deserve 1 star. Make no mistake, these radios are absolute junk. Although we currently own two Kaito KA600 Multiband radios (one is just decent, one is  really bad). I prefer (less expensive) KA450, model better. In fact when you factor in the price difference the KA450, KA500 & KA550 would all be worth considering If only Kaito quality was where it should be. The idea is good, unfortunately something was lost in the execution, that something lost is quality.Again it's just too bad the quality is hit or miss and unfortunately it has been my experience that it is usually miss. I really wanted to like these radios, but because of the issues I've mentioned, cannot recommend them and rarely even use mine. In my opinion they are better suited for the trash bin than on my desk. What an absolute waste of money.10/1/2014 Update - These Kaito radios are very bad quality. The unit that I described as "okay" has proven to be as poorly made as the others. In fact when I extended the antenna last night, something sharp cut my finger, so I looked at the antenna - a sharp brass-like clip that apparently holds each section of the antenna to the next came out of the antenna and cut my finger. I was able to carefully re-install the top section of the antenna into the rest of the antenna, but it just proves how poorly made these radios are, using the cheapest quality components possible. Again, I would never buy another, nor would I recommend a Kaito radio. I'm also not happy that I was injured by this piece of rubbish.

I actually use this primarily as a pen, as it writes wonderfully and has a great balance and feel to it. It is a very comfortable and attractive pen. The exceptional and responsive stylus is a plus, whether I'm using my smartphone or Kindle. I actually keep this on my desk so it is always close at hand.

I find it difficult to find  well-built compact multiband radios these days, and when it comes to radios I'm a bit of a perfectionist. Some multiband radios currently on the market  lack any quality and are completely unacceptable. Fortunately I find the Sangean ATS 505P to be well-built and perfect for my needs. This compact radio packs a lot of great features in a compact package. I suggest you familiarize yourself with all of its features by looking at the owner's guide or perhaps view a video review online, because once you are familiar with all of the controls, this radio will amaze you.The sensitivity of the tuner is truly amazing. AM & FM reception is great! I can even pick-up out-of-state FM stations that I never knew existed. Shortwave reception is very impressive using the long built-in extendable antenna. In fact is the best compact radio I've used for overall reception quality.I usually use a larger desktop sized receiver with a long-wire antenna for shortwave reception, but this radio is great to take on the go.This gem has so many great features such as the fine-tuning, lock-out switch (so you don't accidently turn on/off or change stations) and much more.The sound quality is also excellent. In fact in my opinion, along with its twin, the Radio Shack 20-629,  this is most impressive, best designed and overall the best portable multiband radio I've used in decades.  This really is an impressive radio that performs as well or better than other more expensive portable multiband receivers.You can't go wrong with the Sangean ATS 505P if you are looking for a great sounding multiband radio with outstanding sensitivity and reception. I would definitely recommend this radio to everyone.

Nowadays, it is very difficult to find a well-built compact multiband radio, and when it comes to radios I'm a bit of a perfectionist. Some multiband radios on the market these days lack any quality and are completely unacceptable. Fortunately I find the Sangean ATS 505P to be well-built and perfect for my needs. This compact radio packs a lot of great features in a compact package. I suggest you familiarize yourself with all of its features by looking at the owner's guide or perhaps view a video review online, because once you are familiar with all of the controls, this radio will amaze you.The sensitivity of the tuner is truly amazing. AM & FM reception is great! I can even pick-up out-of-state FM stations that I never knew existed. Shortwave reception is very impressive using the long built-in extendable antenna. In fact is the best compact radio I've used for overall reception quality.I usually use a larger desktop sized receiver with a long-wire antenna for shortwave reception, but this radio is great to take on the go.This gem has so many great features such as the fine-tuning, lock-out switch (so you don't accidently turn on/off or change stations) and much more.The sound quality is also excellent. In fact in my opinion, along with its twin, the Radio Shack 20-629,  this is most impressive, best designed and overall the best portable multiband radio I've used in decades.  This really is an impressive radio that performs as well or better than other more expensive portable multiband receivers. The accessories that come with the Sangean ATS 505 such as the eaebuds, carrying case, AC adapter and shortwave reel antenna are very nice extras.In my opinion, you can't go wrong with the Sangean ATS 505P if you are looking for a great sounding multiband radio with outstanding sensitivity and reception. I would definitely recommend this radio to everyone.

The Grundig Satellit 750 is an excellent radio. Ive only owned mine for a few days short of a month, so I should say that I am still learning how to use all the features that it has. Reception of AM, FM & Shortwave is exceptional. AM with the rotatable antenna, FM & Shortwave with the very impressive telescopic antenna. I also have a very nice outdoor  40+ foot long-wire antenna hooked up to the shortwave and I must say that the built in telescopic antenna performs nearly as well as the long-wire. (I can't say the same for other shortwave receivers I own, but the Grundig's telescopic antenna is THAT GOOD).Sensitivity and reception is excellent on this radio. Equally impressive is control feel (sturdy & smooth), sound quality (excellent) and overall build quality. I waited for months for the Grundig 750 Satellit to come in and it was well worth the wait. I must also say that Eton/Grundig customer service is excellent as their friendly staff is always helpful.The first 750 Satellit I received arrived in an open box (seals were broken) and the owner's manual was clearly been used. I called Eton/Grundig and spoke to a tech specialist and he verfied that the box should have had the seals intact and when I asked him what he would do, he didn't hesitate to say that if it were him he would return it. Explaining that I purchased a "new" radio and should not accept an open box. Taking his advice, I returned the unit to Amazon (who were sold out at that time) but fortunately I found another major retailer that had some just arrive in stock.My present Grundig Satellit 750 arrived quickly and in perfect condition in a sealed box,  and I eagerly installed the 4 "D" cell alkaline batteries and begain enjoying my new receiver. Owning other shortwave receivers, I must say I am amazed at how many shortwave broadcasts this receiver pulls in with its telescopic antenna. Still, since I keep this unit on my desk next to my computer monitor, I do keep it hooked up to one of my long-wire antennas. A nice feature is a switch on the right side so you can easily switch between  an external antenna (such as my long-wire) and the internal (telescopic antenna). The rotatable AM antenna is also a very, very nice feature and it certainly pulls in far away AM stations with ease as well.As I previously stated, I'm still learning how to use all of the wonderful features of this Grundig (such as programming in stations to the pre-sets. I may call Eton/Grundig tech support for help with that) but what I have learned is what a wonderful and well-built receiver the Satellit 750 is.Since these are not inexpensive units (I paid $248.99 for mine), I personally recommend looking into an extended warranty if available. Fortunately the retailer I purchased mine from offered a 3 year warranty that even covers accidental damage from drops or spills, at a very resonable cost, so I did not hesitate to purchase the extended warranty.I am extremely pleased with the Grundig Satellit 750 receiver, and Eton/Grundig customer service. In fact I am enjoying mine so much I considered purchasing another as a Christmas gift for my father-in-law, as I think he would enjoy hearing broadcasts from around the world, not to mention the great reception of local and not-so-local AM & FM broadcasts.Although I still enjoy my old fashioned Realistic DX-100 shortwave receiver, and my other shortwave radios, I must say that overall the Grundig Satellit 750 is the best receiver I've ever owned. It would not be my first choice if I was looking for a truly portable radio, but it is certainly my first choice when looking for a receiver with the best overall performance (you can carry it around, it even has a carrying handle, but it is rather big and with 4 "D" cell batteries installed, rather heavy as well). In any case, it looks great on my desk (my trusty DX-100, and my very portable and exceptional performing Radio Shack 20-629 receiver) sit on my file cabinet right beside it.I highly recommend the Grundig 750 Satellit. In my opinion they are worth every penny of their MSRP. I wouldn't hesitate to purchase one again.

After suffering through many, many, really bad Kaitos only to return them to get more bad Kaitos (what happened to their quality?), this Radio Shack 20-629 Shortwave is a delight. It actually pulls in distant AM stations where the Kaitos (particularly the KA600) couldn't even pull in the close ones (It must have a very good Ferrite Rod AM antenna). The same goes for FM as well as shortwave. The signal strength & sensitivity is amazing. I am receiving strong reception of out-of-state FM stations that I didn't even know existed. It is powered by four AA batteries or an optional 6V AC adapter. This little gem of a radio is extremely well-made, well-designed, packed with useful and thoughtful features and performs flawlessly. The only thing that could possibly make it better is a NOAA station, but it's pretty darn perfect the way it is. In fact it's the best compact multiband radio I've seen in a long time.This gem of a multiband radio is packed with many useful & thoughtful features such as the fine tuning mode and the 'lock' switch (to prevent accidently turning off/on or changing stations). As stated, the sensitivity is amazing and it receives strong reception of AM-FM and Shortwave stations (much better than any other compact portable multiband I have used). The sound is excellent as well whether listening to music, news or shortwave. The long telescopic antenna is enough to pull in shortwave stations from around the world (as well as distant FM stations that come in strong & clear).  However I recently hooked it up to one of my external long-wire antennas and was absolutely blown away by the incredible shortwave reception (It rivals much more expensive receivers). Even at the original MSRP it would be an excellent value, and at the discounted prices it is now selling for it is an absolutely amazing value. I have not seen or used a portable multiband radio this impressive since Sanyo's RP 8700 debuted in 1975. If you familiarize yourself with this great little radio and all of its features and you will be amazed at its performance.I love it!

I replaced a 16 year-old Bell Headlight on my mountain bike with the Bell Lumina 200 and found that I liked it so much I also put one on my 10 speed racer (which had a 'CatEye' headlight that was nowhere near as good as this Bell). I found the installation easy. I'm very appreciative that Bell includes extra rubber mounting strips so that these will fit on virtually any handlebar. These headlights produce more than enough light for any driving condition I encounter and I also like the flashing mode in order to be seen by others.These Bell Lumina headlights have proven to be trouble-free. Just be aware that you will need a small phillips head screwdriver to install or replace the batteries (three AAA).I've always been satisfied with Bell products for my bikes. Highly recommend!

My mountain bike came with a nicely padded Selle Royal seat but it still became uncomfortable after a mile or two. At first I was considering a memory foam seat pad until I saw the Bell Recline 825 Memory Foam Seat selling for about the same price as a pad. I didn't hesitate to order one via Amazon Prime and it arrived 2 days later. Installation was easy, as all I needed was a 6mm allen wrench. I adjusted the new seat to my liking and took a ride. This seat is amazing, as the miles went by I remained comfortable. The memory foam certainly does the trick, as this seat is virtually identical in size to my Selle Royal but it is much more comfortable. Now I can continue to ride without having to take a sore butt break. I highly recommend the Bell Recline 825 Memory Foam Bike Seat. It is perfect for mountain bikes and 10 speed road bikes. It looks good too.

Having owned a grooming shop decades ago, my old Miller's Forge Professional Grooming Shears have worn out. Not wanting to spend $100 for another pair, I ordered these for when I trim my dogs. I was pleasantly surprised at the sharpness & quality in a very low priced pair of grooming scissors. I don't expect them to perform or hold-up like a $100 pair of grooming shears, but they will do just fine for occasionally trimming my 3 dogs. These Miller's Forge scissors are an excellent value.

The Roadmaster Granite Peak Mountain Peak Mountain Bike is an excellent value. It is a very well-made bike with 18 speeds and thoughtful touches such as a quick adjustable seat. It has excellent tires to ride on rough dirt trails or commute on a city street. The brakes work great & the shifters work easily & are precise. The handlebars have a slight upward bend and are positioned very comfortably.The bike's frame is painted a very attractive shade of teal with purple accents, and it is a very good looking and functional bike. This 24" bike is perfect for the shorter rider. If you are 5'5" or shorter this will most likely be a much more comfortable bike for you than a 26" bike. When it comes to a value this one would be hard to beat.

The Roadmaster Granite Peak Mountain Peak Mountain Bike is an excellent value. It is a very well-made bike with 18 speeds and thoughtful touches such as a quick adjustable seat. It has excellent tires to ride on rough dirt trails or commute on a city street. The brakes work great & the shifters work easily & are precise. The handlebars have a slight upward bend and are positioned very comfortably.The bike's frame is painted a very attractive shade of teal with purple accents, and it is a very good looking and functional bike. This 24" bike is perfect for the shorter rider. If you are 5'5" or shorter this will most likely be a much more comfortable bike for you than a 26" bike. When it comes to a value this one would be hard to beat.

The Roadmaster Granite Peak Mountain Peak Mountain Bike is an excellent value. Keep in mind this is a relatively inexpensive bike, so don't expect an ultra-light weight bicycle. Still it is not what I would consider a heavy bike either, in fact it is a well-made bike with 18 speeds and thoughtful touches such as a quick adjustable seat. It has excellent tires to ride on rough dirt trails or commute on a city street. The handlebars have a slight upward bend and are positioned very comfortably. We purchased ours (for my wife) at a local big box store and then took it to our local bike shop to have it adjusted properly. Once adjusted we were pleasantly surprised at how well everything works.The brakes work great & the shifters work easily & are precise. The only thing I would change on the bike would be to replace the very hard seat with a more comfortable memory foam seat. (My personal preference is memory foam as opposed to gel seats, because gel seat have a tendency to leak as they get older). Also my wife added a water bottle holder & water bottle - (The mounting screws are already on the frame).Speaking of the frame, it is painted a very attractive shade of teal with purple accents, and it is a very good looking and functional bike. This 24" bike is perfect for the shorter rider. If you are 5'5" or shorter, this will most likely be a much more comfortable bike for you than a 26" bike. When it comes to a value this one would be hard to beat.

Pure Lye Drain Cleaner saved us a lot of trouble as well as the expense of having a plumber once again come out to clear our kitchen drain. We have a very troublesome kitchen drain, most likely because the pipe is straight for 25-30' but then takes a sharp 90 degree turn as it goes to the main drain pipe in our basement. I remember many times having to bail out the kitchen sink as we waited for a plumber to come and unclog the pipe. Well this time we first tried an acid based drain cleaner which did absolutely nothing, so before I called a plumber I looked on Amazon to read the reviews for different types of drain cleaners. I was impressed by what I read about pure lye drain cleaners, so we decided to give it a try. After just two treatments of just one tablespoon of pure lye, our sink is completely unclogged and draining faster than I have ever seen it drain before. Another good thing about this product is that there is no odor like with the acid based drain products. We decided that we will put a tablespoon in our sink each month to keep it clear of clogs. Pure Lye really worked for us.

The Spigen SGP Screen Protector is excellent in every way. It is extremely easy to install even for a klutz like me. Just follow the simple directions and you have a super clear screen protector that is virtually impossible to see. The quality is excellent. I especially like the fact that you don't need to wet the protector or the device to install it correctly - It goes on dry, and again is very easy to install. I was at first hesitant to attempt to install this myself, however there was absolutely no need to worry. The Spigen went on perfectly centered and bubble-free. In fact when I need screen protectors for any device in the future I will look for the Spigen name. Highly recommended.

After my Nano 4th Generation finally gave up the ghost, I purchased the Nano 7th Generation. This iPod had a feature I'm glad they finally put on the iPod - an FM radio which works great. This iPod was easy to sync to my iTunes and works wonderfully. The touch screen is easy to use and  the controls are very intuative. The nice screen is bright, clear and easy to read. The sound quality is excellent. Battery life is excellent. Although I'll miss my old Nano, this new one appears to incorporate all the great features of my old iPod, while offering some welcome new features.

These bulbs will save me a ton of money over the years. They are bright, they are warm light and a true flood light, not a spot light, I am using four bulbs in a gu10 canarm track light I bought on Amazon ...I love these bulbs

I think this is a wonderful light fixture. I have it in my hallway. With four lights I directed one to the up stairs, one to the downstairs, and two on the coat closet.I bought a six pack of gu10 LED bulbs triangle brand here on Amazon , I did not use the glass shade that come with this fixture, the LED bulbs look great without them. I also found it impossible to install the bulb with the glass shade on, like another reviewer. I recommend this fixture.

I bought this attic stair cover to replace the box shaped one I made ten years ago out of styrofoam sheets. The styrofoam cracks after handling it every time we get stuff out of the attic, my attic is only high enough to crawl around in. I opened this insulation tent in the attic, covered the opening and it stayed very firmly. It fit the entire attic stair opening perfectly. It stays up and the ladder does not hit it at all. I think this will be good to keep the cold and hot drafts from entering the house.

I used this product to glue a huge patch on to my canvas jacket. This was a patch with words on it not a mending patch to be clear. It comes with a large plastic bottle for fabric gluing, a small bottle to glue bling onto things and a small bag of gems. The directions are clear, poke a hole in the spout of glue and only glue one side of the project in dots or wave pattern. Place patch on garment and I put I sheet of foil under the fabric and another sheet on top of the patch so the glue won't seep into the fabric, I put books as a weight on top and left it alone overnight. The next day the patch was very firmly attached no bleed through, I wanted to save money buy doing the patch myself instead of going to the Taylor. I was happy with the results. Washing machine safe but not dry cleaning safe. The glued patch remained flexible not stiff from the glue.
Very nice shield. This looks like it would cost fifty dollars or so. Well made.
Great value. Christmas wrapping uses alot of tape. This tape works great in your dispenser.

I live in NYC. I have neighbors attached to my home. My neighbor has roaches,  therefore I have roaches. This product once sprayed on the areas I see a roach, they are gone for 8 weeks. But after using this for 2 years, I will tell you that the smell is powerful,  you need to leave that area for 6 hours until the odor disappears.
These are very strong. They are thick steel. You can not bend these with your bare hands. Easily holds my  bicycles in the garage.

Wow, what a great clock and hiding place.The clock is very accurate and looks wonderful.The back swings open to hide stuff you don't want to loose.A real bolted down safe is a true safe, this is more of a hiding placefor items I use everyday like my engagement ring, tennis bracelet and wedding band.It is great to have a hiding place from your kids friends or a snoopy guest.

This is my computer desk lamp at home. We have these at work and I loved it so much I bought one for my home. The bulb lasts a very long time. The light is crisp and clean. The fact that it is fully adjustable is great.

I am a retiree and have owned  over 19 computers in the last 25 years. This HP laptop is wonderful. the graphic card is ultra sharp, videos play smooth and crisp. It is very fast  and has a ton of storage. I recommend it.

Arrived in very good condition...I had an air leak coming from the pull down attic stairs. I stapled this around the the pull down door covering the gap. The principal is the same as a door sweep. When you close the attic stairs this neoprene seals the crack around the hatch.
I was blown away at how sharp lorex cameras are. Each video it records is in real time. I put a camera on each door of my home front, side and rear doors. The forth I have on the cars and driveway.
Ok, so I have a lot of DVD's from around the world and this blu ray player plays them all, in HD. It also up converts dvd's. Great Wi Fi reception
Vetch phones are wonderful. I have been using Vtech products since 1986. These batteries last a long time and tolerate being charged thousands of times.

This is my first time using this brand filter in my 2000 RAV4 . The black filter frame is ridge but still made a good seal. I change this filter every twelve months because every engine loves to breath clean air.

Good old Fram. I have used Fram filters both air and oil since the 70's. I love the soft rubber seal around this air filter for perfect form fitting in my 2001 Honda CRV. No air leaks. I change my air filter every twelve months which is only about 5000 miles. Every engine loves to breath in clean air.
Very nice DELI brand tape dispenser. It did come in blue, very nice and two rolls of tape, on the narrow side but fine for xmas wrapping. It is nice and heavy so you can use it one handed.

I took my 15 year old Toyota RAV4 for its annual inspection here in New York State. My repair guy said I had an oil leak coming from someplace in the engine, he added uv dye and I had to return in three weeks to find the leak.I bought this product added it, drove thirty minutes after pouring it in the crankcase. If someone tells me I have an oil leak, I don't wait weeks to check it.I see no oil drops under the car anywhere.
This cleared up my cough from nasal drip coming down my throat from my sinuses. I felt better and coughing was less within two doses.

I have a freshwater aquarium community tank. For some reason, only my 2 angelfish have been infected with ich. I add one teaspoon for each ten gallons of water. After a few days of daily treatment, and I can see a big reduction in white salt like attachments on the Angels. I have to continue for three days past the last sign of ich on the fish to kill all of them. So far so good. This is a dark blue liquid that makes your water a little blue tint, not bad looking at all. All of my other fish, appear to have no negative impact at all from this treatment.

Hot cocoa complete with powdered milk. Nothing else to add (ok maybe thirty mini marshmallows ) pop one hot cocoa k cup in your machine and bang your good to go. Rich milk chocolate flavor. Make a full mug.
I waited until I used this iron for one year before I reviewed it. This iron with steam has held up for my large family. It does a good job getting the creases in my jeans, and a silk tie as well
Very easy to assemble and comfortable too. They look perfect in my dinning room, it matches the other wood furniture. I did buy seat pads for them.

This is the one. When my wife ordered this for my office I was not positive it would be perfect. I am very picky about the chair I use 12 hours a day.Wow, is this chair comfy and roomy, I like it.It's thick padded, well made & looks good to.
This black Rolex as I call it is very special because it's beautiful. It feels so good on my wrist. The ladies love it.
This three pack came in handy. I needed one for the front yard, and both sides off the house. Strong hoses that take beating in the sun and snow....no leaks
Solid oak. Very well made. Strong construction . The pine artwork is beautiful. Looks great above the fireplace in the cabin.
Very comfortable chairs. The table is so big. We all fit. We get many guests who also love it.
Very cost effective . Saves me a ton of money on my electric bill. The color is warm not cool. The light pattern is even.
THIS UNIT HAS HELD UP NICELY FOR YEARS. THE CHROME FINISH IS PERFECT AFTER BEING USED AND CLEANED OVER AND OVER, NO LEAKS AND LOOKS GREAT, THOSE ARE THE 2 THINGS YOU ASK FOR IN A FAUCET.

THIS FAN IS PERFECFT FOR OUR BATHROOM. YES THE BATHROOM. SOMETIMES YOY NEED AIR CIRCULATION. THIS HAS BEEN IN USE FOR 5 YEARS, USED DAILY AND STILL LOOKS AND WORKS WELL. THE COLOR OF THE BRONZE FINISH HOLDS UP TO HEAT AND HUMIDITY OF OUR FAMILY BATHROOM. IT PUTS OUT A GREAT DEAL OF WIND MOVEMENT.

I own this desk for 4 years.  I waited a long time to write this review to give a long term report.This desk has held up very well. It does not wobble, shake or move after 4 years of daily use. I have the draws packed, over stuffed with old laptops and dvd's. The hinges are fine the draw tracks are fine the handles never got loose once. I recommend this put together unit with two points of ADVICE;FIRST; use wood glue when you are putting this together, (only if you plan on not relocating this outside the room.)SECOND: never, never tape a note to this unit, THE TAPE WILL REMOVE THE Laminate.
Tastes very good. Perfect for lunch at work. Microwave and eat, it comes in its own bowl. Very cost effective.

So you work nights and have to sleep during the day. Between the light in your room, landscapers blowing leaves etc...you need all the help you can get to sleep.I have used these for three months. I fall asleep within five minutes and deep sleep for six or seven hours. Now listen, your not in a coma, if you have a dog and he barks you will wake up, if the phone rings ( it should be off) you will wake up.After six hours of sleep after using these gel caps, you will not have a headache or be groggy.Ps...you only take one pill...all other brands you must take two...so good

These are very good, I put them under the four legs of my heavy ottoman. I did apply a drop of glue on each one so when I pick up the ottoman to vacuum or shampoo the carpet these gliders will stay where they belong.The heavy  ottoman slides easily on the carpet with these gliders. I can recommend these.

I have owned 4 electric and one alcohol fireplace over the years and this one is great. The fireplace arrived today by fedex and when I took it out of the box it was perfect. It was very well boxed with plenty of styrofoam to protect it. It really was 100% assembled, even the casters on the bottom where attached. The solid wood construction and stain finish is well done. No dent, scratches or imperfections at all. The remote changes flame brightness, speed and color. It also turns heat on and off.  The primary use of this unit will be for the flame effect. The heater on this unit is hot and works well but heat was not the main reason I bought this. If you go on YouTube and search SPECTRAFIRE PLUS, the video of theses led flames is amazing and uses almost no electricity.The logs glow internally red as if they are red hot, the blue flame effect at the base of the fire is very realistic.  This is furniture grade cabinet and mantel. The fireplace is very quiet almost silent with just the flames on. I did buy a fire crackle sound machine that creates that crackle pop sounds that burning wood makes.  This is an investment that will last forever. I should mention that since this is real wood, you could use  Minwax Polyshades to change the color of the cabinet and mantel. For example I might, use it to change the color to espresso, or dark cherry to look more like the color of the other furniture in the room. Poly shades can only make the wood darker not lighter.  Would I recommend this electric fireplace..Yes
Big friendly self lighting and self inflates Tom turkey. It says Thanksgiving is here, try the beef.
Great front porch Christmas dog lover decoration. Self inflated and lights up. Colorful and really says the Christmas season is here.

Well made, large and good looking. I ordered two, one had the apple design and one had a different design, put just as nice.  These work well on my ottoman. Has a nice feel. Fits chips and dip bowls..all the stuff to watch the tonight show.A good reason for getting these trays is the bottom does not directly touch what it is resting on...it has a 1/4 inch lip around the bottom, to act as feet if you will...this can save your wood table, leather or vinyl ottoman from getting heat damage if you put something hot on the tray ie coffee, tea or soup.

Sounds very authentic. Comes with three aaa batteries. Fits in the palm of your hand. On off button and low and high volume. I put it on the mantle of the electric fireplace behind a photo and works great. It does not sound like rain as another reviewer mentioned.

I like it. The description is accurate. Lights up, inflates just plug it in. Comes with weighted bottom and two tie downs. Very colorful. If your like me, after 50 years of putting many small decorations up outside each holiday, I now put up one large display...this 4 footer fits the bill...I bought the 4 foot turkey FOR THANKSGIVING and the 4 foot Santa FOR CHRISTMAS as well....
He is so handsome...very well made, handmade...looks awesome
This is very well made, no defects, and very nice addition to my Christmas decorations

I have used this for one month and it works...i find I fall asleep within a minute or two, sleep for seven hours without waking at all..after seven wonderful hours of restful sleep I have no after effects of using zzz quill..no headache no grogginess...I use it ...I like it
Very funny Santa..I was laughing when I took him out of the package...he is wearing a sweater outfit and his beard is in braids ...he stands up without falling over...

I installed my 9w green killing machine one year ago and the bulb still works, which is great because I have it running 24/7/365...the only reason I bought this replacement uv bulb, is because the water started to run very slow out of the unit, I new sludge was the culprit. ..the uv bulb comes sealed in the plastic chamber. .it took 5 minutes to swap out the bulb...and the water flowed full blast, like when it was new...

Nice thin cord, good length, has on off switch built in. I was amazed that the cord came with a night light bulb...that's great....I use 1/2 watt led night light bulbs...The reason I get these cords is, I have Tiffany style small table lamps that use one night light bulb.I think two bulbs are much better, pushing double the amount of light through the Tiffany like stained glass.

Made by PennPlax, these produce millions of full size bubbles in my 29 gallon BioCube tank...aeration is vital to push bad gases to the surface and get them out of your aquarium.  These air stones move a lot of water to get oxygen into your water....I have been using these since 1980...like all air stones they will clog in 8 months or so....there is No clog free stone...over the years I have tried just putting the air line tubing in the aquarium without an air stone and the open end of the tubing would clog....

The sound is full thanks to the solid wood construction. .no veneers. ..Washburn truly made this under $200 acoustic guitar a  work of art..gloss finish makes this look gorgeous if I'm playing it or in the rack.

Very nice stand for my Washburn. ..all steel construction and rubber feet and safety strap to keep nephew from knocking it over. .height is fully adjustable and the bottom swivels to accommodate any of my odd shape axes
GE makes this cord, you can feel how thick and well made it is...dollar store cords should be avoided...

Works very well. .the body is made of metal...I installed 2 led bulbs and it worked fine...I set it to stay on for 10 minutes, this gives me time to walk from my home to the trash bins and still have plenty of time to get back to the house. ..the motion sensor is sensitive. .it turned on the bulbs fast, as soon as I left the house. .

You might say.."why pay double for a toilet seat?"Well that is a great question. ..this seat was $50 ..and then I thought about how many times the seat gets used in one week by 3 family members keeping in mind we have one bathroom. ..so the number of times this seat gets used in one week is 84 times...or if you like annual usage the seat must "hold up" 4,368 times.  This commercial seat is twice as thick as the Lowes version. ..100% white plastic. ..painted wood seats chip..someone asked me if it is a slow closing lid...it is not

Awesome replica of the grave digger...my grandson loved it..it is very, very highly detailed, its heavy, and my grandson has seen the real gravedigger truck in person so he knew what the toy should look like, he says its great...
So adorable...it comes boxed by Hallmark...I real keepsake
It is the size of a baseball...I put it in my 6000 gallon above ground pool, covered it and now I will see how it works when I open the pool in the spring...I will update this review then.
These are the same size as a night light bulb and use very little electricity and generate almost no heat, they are just as bright as a 5w bulb

I was planning on buying one slide whistle for my 4 year old grandson...but then I put an order in for 6...what fun for the the family to make a home video of us trying to be musicians. ..great sound well made and inexpensive

I have thick wavy hair..I use this product because it holds my fly away hair...after shampooing I towel dry my hair. .I apply this very nice scented product by using just a dab. ..rub it into my hair and brush immediately. .it holds all day..no gel drawbacks like shiny crispy hair...did I mention that it smells  awesome. .During the day, I can re brush my hair and this keeps working, gel on the other hand, once it dries if you re brush your hair you get dried gel flakes and no hold...this product is wonderful

How simple!  Put a magnet on the back of your phone and BAM!  instant phone holder.  I love this Mengo Car Mount.  No fussing with pressure arms, no issues with the clipping the vent magnet onto the vent.  It is awesome!  All you have to do is place the magnet in between your case and your phone, push the vent magnet into a vent and you have a terrific phone holder for your car.  Don't hesitate to buy this simple but extremely useful cell phone holder.  This will be my christmas gift for my family this year.
Very itchy material.  Child would not wear it!

I have never purchased Solid Gold pet food before.  This is my first experience with it.  My cats (one three year old and an 8 week old kitten) both took to eating this food quickly.  I am not sure if it is because it is something new or it is because it tastes delicious.  Either way, I can see that there are great ingredients in this food and I feel confident that my cats are getting the proper nutrition from it.  I like it because it is an all stages cat food so both of my cats can eat it.  I will update my review after they are on it for a few weeks.

I have never purchased Solid Gold pet food before.  This is my first experience with it.  My cats (one three year old and an 8 week old kitten) both took to eating this food quickly.  I am not sure if it is because it is something new or it is because it tastes delicious.  Either way, I can see that there are great ingredients in this food and I feel confident that my cats are getting the proper nutrition from it.  I like it because it is an all stages cat food so both of my cats can eat it.  I will update my review after they are on it for a few weeks.

I consider myself an expert plucker.  I was blessed with bushy italian eyebrows and a thick italian beard.  On a daily basis I am plucking my face in one spot or another in order to NOT look like one of the cavemen in the Geico commercial.  This tweezer is very good.  I have no complaints about it.  I am able to grip the tweezer well and I am able to easily remove hairs.  The price is the only negative about this tweezer.  I have been using Revlon Expert Tweezer, Slant Tip for several years and I have not found anything better yet.  And the price is almost 1/3  of this one.  I have 4 Revlon Expert Tweezers in my possession.  One in my bathroom, one in my car, one in my desk draw and one in my pocketbook.  If this tweezer was more reasonable I would purchase several of these because it works very well.  But when I can get nearly 3 of them for the same price as this one why would I do that?

I never thought Bose was worth the money.  I thought it was just hype.  Boy was I wrong.  For something that is so small this radio really puts out a great sound.  It has a great footprint for a stereo system.  The remote is terrific for utilizing the system from various distances.  I am very pleased with this Wave Radio and I believe that the price reflects the level of quality and sound you will receive.

I really like this Waistpack.  I am able to use my own 20oz insulated bottle with it.  I am not a tiny waisted person and this waistband fits me.  I have used it walking around the neighborhood as well as at an amusement park.  There is a small pocket for a phone and credit cards.  Water, credit cards, phone......what else do you need at an amusement park?  Definitely recommend this waistpack for those of us who aren't into running.

As usual, Radio Flyer is a terrific brand of child toys and ride ons.  The quality of this trike is great.  It was easy to put together and my 3 year old was riding it immediately.  I would not hesitate to purchase Radio Flyer products.  The bikes, trikes and wagons are the best in the field.

This is a very nice shelter.  It does a good job of keeping the sun and the elements off of you.  We use this at our baseball games and the boys enjoy sitting in it.  It is well made and I see this lasting a long time.

This stuff works!!!  I never thought you could cover up the smell of poop but this stuff does it.  The 4 oz bottle is very large.  It is not something you can discreetly carry into the bathroom unless you have a large pocketbook.  I would not hesitate to purchase this item.  It works great!!

Honestly I don't think Luvs doesn't get the credit that it deserves.  No this is not one of the highest priced diapers. It isn't one of the highest quality diapers either . Your child will not be able to urinate in this diaper for hours and hours on end.  There are some diapers where children can urinate several times in the same diaper and it will hold up. Luvs is not one of those types of diapers . With that said , I highly recommend Luvs diapers because of the cost and the overall quality of the diaper. If you are a parent that changes their child's diaper regularly these diapers will work for you and will cost you half the amount of money that other diapers cost you. I have read that some children who have sensitive skin have issues with this brand of diaper. None of my foster kids have had issues with this brand and therefore I continue to buy it. I have used Pampers, Huggies and various storebrand diapers and in the end I still choose to buy Luvs over the other brands.  Why? Because I honestly feel I get more for my money with this brand of diapers than the rest. I have no issues with leaking and my foster children stay dry as long as I don't keep the same diaper on them for hours and hours on end . Diapers are so expensive, I would strongly suggest you try these diapers to see if they work for your child because you will save a ton of money in the long run.

This is a great casual/semi dressy watch.  The white band allows you to wear it with anything and the goldtone around the face watch makes it appear dressier which is very nice . the time is very large on this watch so those that need magnifiers will not necessarily need them to look at this watch and read the time. this watch appears to cost more than the $20 price tag. I think that this watch is a great addition to any wardrobe. The quality seems terrific and I would not hesitate to buy this item.

I am a loyal Lancome mascara user and this stuff just doesn't compare.  I ended up spending so much more time separating my lashes and removing clumps than I do with my Lancome mascara.  Granted this stuff is $7 compared to much much more for Lancome but I would rather spend more money and love how my lashes look.
The item I received had a fly opening on them.  I wanted the item that is shown in the picture which does not have an opening in the front of the boxer briefs!

What an awesome invention!!!  These suction lids are absolutely terrific.  You can use them with hot or cold items.  They suction very well and I totally love using these.  I would not hesitate to purchase these fabulous lids!

I LOVE this watch!!!!!  For something so cheap it really is awesome!  It is dressy enough to wear with fashionable clothes yet sporty enough to wear for workouts.  I cannot stress how pretty this watch is.  I thought it was going to look very plasticky and it doesn't.  It actually looks like there is silver metal on the watch and there isn't.  Buy this watch if you are looking for a watch to wear every day with everything!

Love the throw and go packs!  I have never used Wisk before today.  I have always been a Tide or ALL girl.  When I had the opportunity to try this detergent I figured....why not.  I was intrigued by the removal of sweat and body stains because I work out a lot.  I have to say that I am very impressed with this laundry detergent.  The smell is great, not too much perfume which is nice but enough that my clothes smell clean.  I will be pricing this detergent out and comparing it with Tide and ALL the next time I need detergent.  This might be my go to detergent from now on, especially if it is cheaper than Tide.

So....A continuous ink printer.....what a great idea.  When the ink runs out, you refill it yourself.  What a concept.  The install was easy and it connected to my WiFi without a problem.  This is a photo printer.  I do not believe that the print quality is that great but I honestly don't care because this printer is used at home for personal documents and homework.  I love the fact that I can refill the ink whenever it gets low.  I will post an update when I have refilled the printer and I will tell you how it works.  Overall a great printer, copy, scan and fax machine.  I think Epson is breaking ground in this new concept of refillable printers.

This comfort mat is OK.  Yes it is cushiony but the material they are using for the cover is like plastic or vinyl.  For $30 I would have expected it to be covered in a microfiber or something else that is nice on bare feet.  I have this in front of my kitchen sink.  It looks nice.  The gray is very dark, it almost can pass for a light black.  When I stand on it, it feels nice compared to my tile floor but if I stand on it too long my feet feel like they are getting stuck on it.  I would purchase this if it was $20 dollars but I don't feel that this mat is worth $30 with the type of exterior material they used over the foam.

I have had several high chairs over the years and this one is just OK to me.  I am not impressed with it.  The box just had everything thrown into to. The poles were just lying in the box.  The instructions were terrible!  It was literally just pictures.  With safety being so important with a high chair I would expect it to be very specific about how to put it together and how to adjust the straps.  This manual was only pictures.  I wanted to use the seat as a booster at my kitchen table.  I didn't know if I had to keep the bottom part of the high chair on or take it off.  I looked at all of the pictures and couldn't tell for certain which way it should go.  I really love the concept of this chair but I cannot recommend it until it comes with a better manual and better instructions as to how to put it together.

I have a 3.5 year old girl who weighs 40 pounds.  She says this car seat is more comfy than her previous car seat which is an evenflo.  She enjoys the cup holder as well as the padded head rests.  I like the quick belt tightening and loosening feature in between the legs.  I feel that my child is very safe in this carseat.  I like that I have 3 different seats in this one seat.  My child will be able to grow with this seat which saves me money in the long run.  : )

This is the most AWESOME water bottle!  This bottle keeps your drinks cold for so many hours!  It is ridiculous. I cannot tell you how many insulated water bottles I have bought over the past two years and this one blows the others out of the water.  It is so great, I bought I second one for myself.  : )  You will not be disappointed purchasing this bottle!

I had never purchased the cinch sack version of Hefty bags.  I am very impressed with the quality.  I wouldn't want to use these for garbage since they are clear but they are perfect for recycling and storage.  I am very happy with these bags and I will purchase cinch sacks in the future.

I am not a techie person.  All I was hoping to do was monitor the front of my house and driveway.  I have a side door that is my front door because I live in a duplex.  So I do not have visibility to see who is in my driveway or who is walking in front of my house.  I really thought pulling this beautiful camera out of the box that I had hit the lottery with this Vine item.  It is a solidly built piece of equipment and it looks great.  The problem is once it was installed I couldn't see anything in my driveway other than a car.  I couldn't tell which neighbor was taking a walk.  The camera STINKS!  You would think something of this size and quality would deliver with it's technology but it doesn't.  This was such a disappointment for me.  I would not recommend this item.  Guess it taught me that looks are everything, it's what is inside that counts.

My daughter is 3 1/2.  She enjoys playing with this toy but she needs for me to be right along side of her while she is playing it.  I don't mind at all because she is learning her letters and letter sounds.  I am pleased with this interactive toy. I would recommend it because there are three levels to this toy.  Because of these three levels this toy will be around for a few years. : )

I am not going to lie.  I love this new concept of laundry packs.  It is so easy to just grab one and toss it into the washing machine.  No more measuring liquid detergent.  Just grab a pack out of the bag and close the lid.  It is that simple.  My family has used All and Tide detergent my entire life.  When I saw this new product with Oxi I new I wanted to try it.  My laundry came out as clean as it usually does.  I didn't see a huge improvement nor did I see dirty clothes when I went to put them in the drier so I guess it is a good product.  Since this detergent worked as well as my Tide packs I will be looking to see how much the All with Oxi costs compared to the Tide packs.

Wow!  A $90 phone with no bloatware??  Are you kidding me???  This is a great unlocked phone for the price.  The screen is bright and Lollipop is much better than the previous Android software.  Now, this is not an iPhone but it also isn't $600 dollars so you need to keep this in mind.  The camera works just fine.  I primarily use my phone for calls, texts, social media and e-mail so I don't require a phone with a huge processor or one that has a ton of unnecessary apps.  The phone feels good in my hand and it doesn't feel cheap at all.  In fact I like the orange peel type feel of the back cover.  It isn't slippery at all.  Prior to activating this phone on the Verizon network I was using a Samsung S4.  This phone is slightly bigger than my S4 but not by much.  The power butting and volume are on the same side of the phone which I haven't seen before.  It really does make it easier to not have to switch the position of my hand to go from powering the screen on to controlling the volume of the ringer.  I can press the power button with my index finger and use my middle finger to adjust the volume.  How simple!  I really love that this phone is so reasonable and comes with everything that I need.  I would not hesitate to purchase a Blu Studio phone.  I think you will agree that you are getting a lot for your money!!
This is a terrific piece of musical equipment.  It works flawlessly and it sells for a great price.  This is the best tune clip that I have ever used.  I will be recommending it to others.

This is a very good mattress protector.  I honestly am not worried about anything other than my child peeing on his bed,  I am confident that this mattress protector will work just as expected.  The quality appears to be very good and it should last a long time.

I was very impressed with this product.  I had heard about Finish but never took the chance to try it.  Always have used Cascade and was happy with it but it is one of the most expensive dish washing detergents. So when the opportunity came to try Finish I took the chance.  I am pleased with this product and from now on I will buy it.  My dishes and glasses came out perfectly clean without any residue.  The price is much lower than Cascade too which is another reason to switch.

I have a 4 year old niece who absolutely LOVED this game.  The giggles and laughter went on for over an hour.  The screaming when the crocodile gently chomped down on our fingers happened every single time.  This is a great game for any young child.  Even toddlers.  It is a simple but fun and exciting game.  If I could make one recommendation to the company it would be to make the teeth smaller and add more teeth so that each round lasts longer and so the threat of the crocodile chomping down someone's finger intensifies with each tooth that is pressed.  We love this game!!

I did not purchase these on Amazon but as a diabetic I wanted to share my reviews of this breakfast sandwich.  With 17 grams of protein and 28 grams of carbs this is a pretty good breakfast sandwich for those of us on the go.  I have to admit that I did add an extra piece of cheese to mine because I was afraid that it would be dry.  I was pleasantly surprised with how good it tasted.  I will be buying these and keeping them in the freezer for those on the go mornings when I don't have time to make breakfast.
Super soft blanket.  Just love the design and comfort of this blanket.  The quality is excellent and I think this blanket would make for a great gift regardless of the occasion.

This speaker is just ok.  I am not super impressed with it.  It is nice that it collapses into itself when not being used but the speaker quality isn't that great.  The overall sound is sub par to say the least.  If you are buying this for a kid I would say no problem they will not even notice the quality, but an adult who enjoys music will definitely be able to tell that this speaker is not of high quality.

What a great product!  When you need it you open it when you don't it is folded up nicely in the back of your car.  I love the wet cooler aspect of this bag.  I use this bag when going to my nephew's baseball games.  I throw a bunch of snacks in the sides and load up some diet pepsi's in the wet cooler and I am good to go!  The other great thing about this bag is that I live in Florida and it is hot most of the year.  Just going to the grocery store and home, some of my frozen items start to defrost forget about having to make a stop somewhere between the store and home.  Now I can just put the frozen and dairy items in the cooler portion of the bag and everything stays cold!  I love this bag and recommend it to all of my friends when they see it in my car.

Absolutely ridiculous to ask it's to review a product for dog food when one can is sent.  There is no possible way to determine how the dog handles the food, whether they truly enjoy it or if it makes them sick.

This product goes on easily.  From the other reviews it seems to work for most people.  I have one big toe and a few of the other toes infected with fungus.  Nothing has worked so far to clear it up.  I will update this post as soon as I see some results.

This printer is just OK.  I am not thrilled with it but it also was not expensive for an all in one printer.  The printer is VERY slow.  I am serious, it is very slow to print.  The print quality is just OK.  I would not use this printer for anything other than printing out a recipe or label to return something.  If you have a paper for college or a document for work that you need printed, I would not use this printer.  The scanner on the other hand is very good.  You will get clear and crisp scans of documents and pictures.  I would scan from this printer, send it to my computer and then print it from a different computer.  I love how small of a footprint this printer takes up.  It will fit basically anywhere.  Overall this printer will get the job done.  You will just need to figure out your needs for this printer and if your expectations are not that high then you will be pleased with this printer.

This is a really good knife.  It slices so easily and cleanly.  It is not too big which makes it easy to handle.  Speaking of the handle, it is a regular traditional style knife.  I would recommend this knife for the price and quality.

I love Contigo products.  I have only found one product of theirs that I was not 100% satisfied with.  This Water Bottle does not disappoint.  I love that it is slim.  It fits in my car's cup holder.  I like the fact that there is no straw.  You just press the button and sip away.  Keeps my water cold all day at work.  What more can you ask for?  I would recommend this item.

I have the new Stillwater style sunglasses that fold completely and fit in a very small case which is great for keeping in my purse when not worn but very inconvenient when taking them on and off for brief periods of time.  I bought this sport case for those exact times when I don't want to fold them up and put away.  Hubby has the Kahuna style and I loved this case as that's what he chose instead of the hard clam shell case.  The Stillwaters are a larger frame and fit in this large sport case perfectly.  Hubby states he wishes the carabiner clip were larger as it won't fit a jean belt loop.  Otherwise, a pretty nice case.
Another Sandra Brown winner!  Loads of twists and turns I never saw coming.  I couldn't put the book down.  I recommend it highly.

Exactly what I needed.  The handle is essential and this stool feels very stable .  I like to turn the handle to either side and step up, this offers a wider foot base.  I love how it slides under the bottom shelf of my pantry and the handle sits flush with the next shelf up.  This provides the perfect storing and makes it accessible at all times - no dragging it out of a storage closet to use.

Where have these been all my life?  I have an eye condition whereby I suffer terribly from photo sensitivity and these sunglasses have helped relieve that and allow me to once again enjoy being outdoors.  The glass lenses are super thin and the entire frame folds up and fits into a hard case that is 2.5"x3.75".  A cleaning cloth accompanies the glasses as well.  The frames have a decorative antique design across the front and a bit along the temple.  I would say the design of the frame is more suitable for a female.I chose the antique silver with dark grey lenses.  I love how what you see through the polarized lenses is the actual color that you see without the glasses on - no artificial colors that most sunglasses give you.  They are quite expensive but I'm of the thinking - you get what you pay for and I look forward to wearing these sunglasses for a very long time.

I had my first Luvvitt back case when I had my iPhone 6 and loved it.  It offered the minimalistic look I was hoping for.  I prefer a naked iPhone but I have a "Scottie" dog pendant that I display on the back of my iPhone and needed the clear back case to glue it to.  When I ordered my new iPhone 6s Plus in the rose gold I wanted to be able to protect yet see the back color of the iphone.  Additionally, I wanted the "Scottie" pendant on the back.  I knew from past experience that Luvvitt would be my go to back case.  Even though the new case is slightly different from my old one, I'm very pleased and can truly appreciate the side buttons being covered.  I've had no issues with the functions of those keys being covered.  If you're looking for a thin near naked clear back case, I can recommend this one.

Continuing the next series of lighthouses that work off of the magic cord which I like because you don't have to take bulbs out of their socket to light the ornament.  We put up a lighthouse themed Christmas tree each year and decorate the fireplace mantel with the Department 56 lighted lighthouses.  I own every single Hallmark Lighthouse Ornament they've offered and they continue to bring us joy throughout the holiday season.

Large number pad buttons which light up along with a white lighted display that is large and eastpy to read.  Additionally the choice of ring tones are varied and include one for Christmas.  I found just running through the menu allowed me to learn more about the functions of the phone then trying to read page by page of the instruction manual - very boring!  I think if you can program one model Panasonic cordless phone you can program all of them.  I didn't find it difficult or challenging at all.  This is a nice system and I recommend it.  Love the silver on white color scheme.

I love stepping onto the mat, it has such a cushioning feeling to the feet.  We have just installed hardwood floors that replaced tiled floors and I bought this mat in the toffee brown cobblestone pattern to run along in front of the sink and dishwasher area which is my baking/cooking prep area.  The mat is more than I had expected.  It wipes up perfectly with a damp dishcloth and I've had no issues with stains or slipping.  So far it has stayed put with no movement at all.  I love the 72" length particularly in my kitchen.  I have ordered a matching one in the 36" size to place in front of my stove which enables me to step from one to the other without stepping on the hardwood flooring.  Hubby liked it so much, I ordered the Nantucket pattern 36" size in Mocha  to go in his bathroom.  I highly recommend these mats.Update:  The 36" mat came packaged in a flat cardboard box the size of the mat.  I had ordered a matching one for the kitchen and a 36" in the Nantucket pattern in Mocha.  Both arrived packaged as described in different boxes.  Both arrived in perfect condition since no rolling or folding was involved.  I highly recommend both the Cobblestone and the Nantucket patterns although the Cobblestone is my favorite but did not come in the lighter color I needed.

We are currently installing new solid hardwood flooring in the majority of our home. I wanted to have my mopping/dusting tools ready for the completed renovation. I went online and read a boatload of reviews from many different sources as well as asked everyone I knew who has solid hardwood floors what they use/recommend. Overwhelmingly, their responses were "Bona" everything - mops, cleaners, etc. I then called the manufacturer of my hardwood and asked, as it was not specified in their care and maintenance info. I received a resounding "that's our go to recommendation for cleaning our hardwood floors". That along with everything else I'd read and heard convinced me. I only hope it holds up being made of plastic.I have put the spray mop together (which by the way, I found to be about a two minute task) and tested it to make sure it works. I'm now ready to conquer hardwood floor cleaning which should be within the next few days.

You can't go wrong with this large capacity one piece tube pan - excellent results!  No stick, no dark cakes (which I appreciate) and easy clean up.  Give yourself the gift of hassle free baking.  Worth every penny spent!

Great deal!  I've stocked up in preparation for the seven dozen jars of Strawberry Freezer Jam we'll be making the end of this month (May) when our order of 28 quarts of strawberries are ready for pick up.  I can't find this product at my local grocery stores for this price.
Can't wait for Season 8 now.  We have them all and recommend for family viewing - how refreshing!
Brought and use this thermometer in our RV refrigerator - works as it should and easy to read.  Recommend.

Mounted this in our RV with the outdoor one attached with Velcro under the steps which we bring in during travel.  We've never had one with humidity before and now we're hoping the one we have in the house goes bad so we can replace it with one like this - maybe one with a bit more info on it.  Having the humidity reading is a very nice feature and living on the east coast our humidity can be unbearable.  I highly recommend it.

I use this in our RV to line cabinet shelves so dishes, cookware and the like don't slide around.  Also I have roll out metal baskets in some of my kitchen cabinets and this works great for keeping small items from falling between the openings.
